file_content.text: Where... what's happened? I can feel... no. No!
What have you done? There's nothing to restrain him now.
We were sent to free you. They told us you can defeat the Empire.
This is our mission.
I've been the Emperor's best-kept secret for centuries. How did you find me?
Leaving you here wouldn't be much of a rescue. The Republic needs your help to defeat the Empire.
This is my mission.
The Force is strong in you. Stronger than I've felt in a long time. And there is another....
That insignia... you serve the Republic. Not a Jedi, but I sense one here....
You shouldn't be here. You can't even use the Force, but I sense something....
You were the one being restrained.
What do you mean?
My struggle held the Emperor in check. How did you find me?
I fought half the Empire to free you. Is this how you say thanks?
You're welcome, jerk.
Who are you? Who sent you?
Your strength fails. You must be free, or all is lost.
You should be one with the Force. Finally at peace.
No peace while you suffer. The Emperor drowns you in black waters.
He wants me to be Darth Revan again. Serve him as I did centuries ago.
You served the Emperor? Doesn't that make you a Sith?
I thought you were a Jedi.
When I fell to the dark side, I became his pawn--sent to wound the Republic. The Jedi destroyed and rebuilt me.
The holorecords say you brought the Republic to its knees as a Sith and saved it as a Jedi. They also say you're dead.
You're "the" Revan. Amazing.
I am dead... and reborn, over and over. Jedi... Sith... many lifetimes.
You look good for your age, Revan. What's your secret?
Wow, you're old.
I led my allies to the galaxy's edge to destroy the Emperor. We didn't understand his true power.
I lost everyone... betrayed from within. The Emperor imprisoned me, kept me alive with Sith alchemy... used me.
You aren't the only one who's lived much longer than normal. How old is the Emperor? How does he survive?
The Emperor has a long life.
He's seen the passage of millennia. His will to live outstrips age, disease... death itself.
Your friend denies the Force's will to stay with you, help you.
You still have her.
It was she who gave me strength to resist all this time. I didn't realize that until now.
Sounds to me like the Emperor's earned everything that's coming to him.
Time for some payback.
His evil won't be contained. It has to be annihilated.
You Jedi lead exciting lives--and by "exciting," I mean "crazy stuff I'm glad doesn't happen to me."
This is one insane story.
Like it or not, you're part of this. We all are.
What use were you to him locked up in here?
Used you how?
I've known both sides of the Force--light and dark. To him, I was a conduit.
One of your allies stabbed you in the back? I assume they paid for that.
Who betrayed you?
He still lives by the same dark forces I do, serving as the Emperor's executioner--his undying wrath.
The Emperor used me as his link to the light side of the Force--the Jedi Order. Through me, he saw visions.
But that same link also gave me influence. I convinced the Emperor peace was in his best interest. Tempered his hate.
The peace is lost. The Emperor makes his final war. Stop him. Flee this place while you can. Use the enemy's vessels.
Thank you, old friend. I will finish what we started.
